channel.title: Phone Cell Internet War Laptop Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: wifi in you eye
item.description: So hiromi and I went to dinner at this really great place called irazu. It was nice. I enjoyed it. afterwards we went to a nice coffee shop and got some coffee.. I planned for this -cuz I brought my laptop… so I could get some work done. I also brought my vision connection kit so I could use my cell phone as a modem and rule!!! however.. I couldn’t get the bastard to work.
